Can we all just take a moment
Scarizard, who's been writing these patch notes for like, forever, is leaving riot this upcoming friday.
Please, everyone /thread and thank him for his hard work. 
Thank you, Scarizard. We'll miss you

Great so by trying to 'balance' support Malz you dump mid-lane malz even harder. Why don't you guys admit that the 6.23 changes was a mistake and revert it or even better, revert the whole rework. You did it for Kog'maw why not Malzahar?
Glad someone else feels this way. Logged in just to comment.  Balancing a support position to further nerf the initial intention as a mid laner is super frustrating.
as an adc, we didnt want him either
as a jungler, we dont want him there when we gank either

> [{quoted}](name=lightdragoon88,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=rI0E4YoG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-07T19:07:09.251+0000)

If I can't jungle malzahar, why should you be able to mid lane him?

{{champion:203}} buffs?
Not even base stats buffs?(which is pretty much all they need)
also lb chain nerfs?

They already nerfed it back when she was reworked by removing the slow. But they did also lower its mana cost to 40 which I think is a little too low. 
And the nerf she received this patch was a major nerf to her early and mid-game which is supposed to be her power spike, so I doubt we'll be be seeing nerfs to her at all anymore. Tbh I just hope they revert the entire rework.
